The Qur’anic researcher said it: The one who created you, so you have made a second characteristic of the profitable, indicating the dignity of the dignity, which is not the validity It is a condemnation of the time after it was alerted that those who were able to do so began to return to it, and the level is made by the members of the same Paying the things on both, and it will be on the authority of the rule and require them to give them what you fulfill and adjust it with some of them, in terms of what is it He made it clear about an incompatible creation, which is not amended in the sense of the knowledge.He went to the first Faris and to the second.And one of the seventy reads: “Justd you” with tension; That is: He made you a reprehensible adherence to the creation, otherwise it will be lost in it, and the lock was transferred from each other that: it was just and adjusted with one means.
